<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby, Tailwind CSS, MDX starter
</h1>

Built on the Gatsby Tailwind CSS starter.
Repository is <a href="https://github.com/jaro124/gatsby-tailwind">here</a>

## 🚀 Quick start

1.  **Create a Gatsby with Tailwind CSS and MDX blog.**

    Use the Gatsby CLI to create a new site, specifying the starter.

    ```shell
    # create a new Gatsby site using the starter
    gatsby new my-starter https://github.com/jaro124/gatsby-tailwind-mdx
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new site’s directory and start it up.

    ```shell
    cd my-starter/
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    Your GraphiQL is now running at `http://localhost:8000/___graphql`!

    Open the `my-starter` directory in your code editor of choice and edit `src/pages/index.js`. Save your changes and the browser will update in real time!

## 🧐 What's inside?

Starter contains:
- tailwindcss
- postcss
- purgecss
- **add mdx support**

![alt](https://mdx-logo.now.sh)

- and more

## Demo site

Demo is available <a href="https://gatsby-tailwind-mdx-w129.netlify.com/">here</a>
